meanings.sent1: The mail carrier redelivered the package to the correct address.
meanings.sent2: I redelivered the library book after forgetting to return it on time.
meanings.sent3: The pizza delivery guy redelivered the same order three times due to a mix-up.
meanings.sent4: She redelivered her promise to always be there for her friend in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The teacher redelivered the instructions to the students to ensure they understood.

meanings.definition: To give back or return (something) that was previously delivered.
meanings.sent1: After borrowing the tools, he redelivered them to his neighbor.
meanings.sent2: The lost wallet was redelivered to its owner by a kind stranger.
meanings.sent3: The cat redelivered the mouse to the doorstep as a 'gift' for its owner.
meanings.sent4: She redelivered the borrowed book with a heartfelt thank you note.
meanings.sent5: The post office redelivered the misplaced letter to the correct recipient.
